ecom-lyn-home-home.textcontent_h9ypvtpnrae_html: Join us on a journey towards a world unified by art, culture, and boundless harmony*
ecom-lyn-home-home.textcontent_bj0orbmoutj_html: Joignez-vous à nous pour une action vers un monde unifié par l'art et la culture*
ecom-lyn-home-home.textcontent_e7gs26vlysb_html: Join us on a journey towards a world unified by art, culture, and boundless harmony*
ecom-lyn-home-home.textcontent_m4p39ynh5j_html: In a troubled world, a vision emerges: the World Harmony Collection.
ecom-lyn-home-home.textcontent_7t8mp8pi4tq_html: Copyright © 2024 Lyn Home Harmony | All Rights Reserved
ecom-lyn-home-home.textcontent_4kerngnm9j2_html: Copyright © 2024 Lyn Home Harmony | All rights reserved
ecom-lyn-home-home.textcontent_5if8yodj6hw_html:
The perfection of Andalusian geometry which continues to shine throughout the world, revisited by Lyn Home Harmony.

 A collection at the crossroads of the influences of the Iberian Peninsula and the Maghreb from the civilization of Al-Andalus (8th – 15th century) to the present day.
ecom-lyn-home-home.textcontent_xwj6a7u3vel_html:
In a tormented world, a vision emerges: the World Harmony Collection.

Carrying a cultural fusion, the World Harmony collection celebrates Moroccan design while honoring the peaceful aspirations of the Palestinian Keffiyeh.

In partnership with Poterie Serghini, each piece evokes 190 years of tradition and innovation in Moroccan craftsmanship. Their unique designs embody unity, diversity and the quest for world peace.

The World Harmony collection merges craftsmanship with solidarity and design with peace.

Every piece you choose will help support humanitarian action in Gaza.

Let's create spaces together imbued with peace and harmony.
ecom-lyn-home-home.textcontent_slrm57m99h_html: Carrying a cultural fusion, the World Harmony collection celebrates Moroccan design while honoring the peaceful aspirations of the Palestinian Keffiyeh.
ecom-lyn-home-home.textcontent_ndvl7aj2rhl_html: In partnership with Poterie Serghini, each piece evokes 190 years of tradition and innovation in Moroccan craftsmanship. Their unique designs embody unity, diversity, and the pursuit of global peace.
ecom-lyn-home-home.textcontent_tomi5wfodia_html: The World Harmony collection fuses craftsmanship with solidarity and design with peace.
ecom-lyn-home-home.textcontent_7gzl2w7gndy_html: Let's work together to create spaces imbued with peace and harmony.
ecom-lyn-home-home.textcontent_o7kkedndrye_html: (*) Shareholders of Ateliers LYN commit to donating an amount of money equivalent to the total profits from the sale of the LYN WORLD Harmony collection to a humanitarian association actively supporting the Gaza Strip as part of the humanitarian effort deployed for civil society, children, women, and adults.

ecom-woodcare-section.headingtext_yrtiwuleeeo_html:
Pour protéger votre meuble, suivez ces étapes que vous nous avons créé par amour !

Votre meuble en bois restera non seulement en bonne santé, mais il sera également prêt à briller comme une étoile dans votre intérieur !

La Weekly routine
 
1. Dust Fighter :
Un plumeau, un chiffon doux. Prenez votre plumeau et débarrassez votre meuble de toute la poussière. Passez ensuite un chiffon doux pour enlever les dernières traces de poussière rebelle. 

2. La Potion Magique :
Éponge douce, savon doux. Mélangez quelques gouttes de savon doux dans de l’eau tiède. Trempez l'éponge dans votre potion et nettoyez délicatement les parties colorées de votre meuble.
ecom-woodcare-section.headingtext_hc868t8nzv_html: Monthly routine : le rituel de la Cire
ecom-woodcare-section.headingtext_i91czpvkv1j_html:
Protectrice Cire pour meubles, un chiffon doux. Donnez à votre bijou une armure brillante pour le protéger des attaques du quotidien. Étalez la cire sur le meuble avec délicatesse.

Last but not least, pensez à protéger votre meuble si vous souhaitez y déposer des éléments trop chauds ou trop froids qui pourraient laisser des marques.

En suivant ces étapes, votre meuble en bois restera non seulement en bonne santé, mais il sera également prêt à briller comme une étoile dans votre intérieur !

ecom-notrehistoire-lyn-section.textcontent_l6ny9ip5g1_html:
Avec ses meubles inspirés de ce que les cultures du monde ont de plus beau, Lyn Home Harmony vous propose de faire de chez vous un espace d'évasion, où le confort de l'intimité se mêle à des pièces d'art intérieur uniques. 

Fabriqués par des artisans marocains, héritiers d'un savoir-faire réputé à travers le monde pour sa finesse, les meubles Lyn Home Harmony sont des pièces rares, robustes et fonctionnelles destinées à illuminer les espaces du quotidien d'une douce touche d'audace.
ecom-notrehistoire-lyn-section.textcontent_g0bmmhlghnd_html:
With its furniture inspired by the most beautiful things from world cultures, Lyn Home Harmony offers you the opportunity to make your home a space of escape, where the comfort of intimacy mixes with unique pieces of interior art.

 Made by Moroccan artisans,
 heirs of know-how renowned throughout the world for its finesse, Lyn Home Harmony furniture is a rare piece,
 robust and functional designed to illuminate everyday spaces with a soft touch of boldness.

 A collection at the crossroads of the influences of the Iberian Peninsula and the Maghreb of the civilization of Al-Andalus
 (8th – 15th century) to the present day.
ecom-notrehistoire-lyn-section.textcontent_ukwqscj8n6p_html:
The story of Ateliers Lyn began 20 years ago, in a small store in the medina of Salé.
 
Specialists in cabinetmaking, they manufacture custom-made furniture designed to last, on behalf of clients attracted by the unique creations of the founder, Lahcen.

 Over time, Lahcen's passion for his profession and the meticulousness of his creations built a growing reputation. He continues to tirelessly manufacture ever more beautiful, more solid and more daring furniture for ever more numerous and satisfied customers.

 The Lyn Workshops are today a true jewel bringing together the techniques of ancestral and precious Moroccan know-how.
ecom-notrehistoire-lyn-section.textcontent_8nodfs7wdak_html:
Welcome to the world of Lyn, a creative brand founded by two passionate minds: Nada and Amina.

 Nada, the granddaughter of cabinetmaker Lahcen from the town of X in Morocco, grew up in the captivating atmosphere of craftsmanship, absorbing the richness of this family heritage.

 Driven by this experience, she brings Lyn her love for creation.
 
Amina, a citizen of the world, joins this adventure with an unwavering passion for humanity. Her curiosity and enthusiasm for cultural diversity are inspiring pillars for Lyn.
ecom-notrehistoire-lyn-section.textcontent_1d72eannsjj_html:
Guided by a common passion and a desire to celebrate differences, Nada and Amina aim to infuse Lyn with creativity without borders. The brand aims to transcend cultural boundaries through the design of unique furniture, thereby inviting everyone to explore and appreciate the richness of global design.
At Lyn, the story of Nada and Amina intertwines with creativity and innovation, offering a unique experience where artisan heritage blends harmoniously with a contemporary vision. We invite you to discover our world, where each piece tells a captivating story and embodies our shared passion for art and design.
ecom-notrehistoire-lyn-section.textcontent_q39z5zvjsrf_html:
Welcome to the world of Lyn, a creative brand founded by two passionate minds: Nada and Amina.

Nada, the granddaughter of cabinetmaker Lahcen from the town of Salé in Morocco, grew up in the captivating atmosphere of craftsmanship, absorbing the richness of this family heritage.

Driven by this experience, she brings Lyn her love for creation. Amina, a citizen of the world, joins this adventure with an unwavering passion for humanity.

Her curiosity and enthusiasm for cultural diversity are inspiring pillars for Lyn.
